summary: Led a team of four developers working on Benefit Connect, a single-tenant B2B SaaS solution used by employers to power their employee benefits experience.
highlights: Co-led the implementation for a new client, delivering a highly configurable solution tailored to the client's specific needs.
Upgraded a client's Employee Self Service (ESS) application from ASP.NET Web Forms to ASP.NET MVC, enhancing performance, user experience, and maintainability.
Integrated Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) and Single Sign-On (SSO) using SAML 2.0 for multiple clients, enhancing application security and overall UX.
Assisted in talent acquisition, conducting interviews for college recruits to support team growth.
